content.text:

The following is a list of episodes of Silk Stalkings.

Season 1 (1991–92)
|EpisodeNumber=1
|EpisodeNumber2=1
|DirectedBy= Don Edmonds
|WrittenBy=Stephen J. Cannell
|ShortSummary= A model is killed in her apartment.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 2
|EpisodeNumber2= 2
|DirectedBy= Worth Keeter
|WrittenBy= Stephen J. Cannell
|ShortSummary= A couple is luring unsuspecting couples to their dungeon for dangerous sexual activities. Rita gets a visit from an old enemy.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 3
|EpisodeNumber2= 3
|DirectedBy= Ralph Hemecker
|WrittenBy= David Peckinpah
|ShortSummary= The two cops investigate a yacht called "S.O.B.", after a man winds up dead on the beach.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 4
|EpisodeNumber2= 4
|DirectedBy= Alan Cassidy
|WrittenBy= Sam Glickson
|ShortSummary= A man is killed while delivering a ransom for his kidnapped daughter, but Chris and Rita discover that there isn't really a kidnapping. Chris tries to make a pasta dinner for his new girlfriend.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 5
|EpisodeNumber2= 5
|DirectedBy= Brian Trenchard-Smith
|WrittenBy= Stephen G. Geyer
|ShortSummary= A congressman is found naked and dead by the sea. Chris helps Rita overcome her insomnia.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 6
|EpisodeNumber2= 6
|DirectedBy= Ralph Hemecker
|WrittenBy= Todd Trotter
|ShortSummary= A serial killer finds his victims in the singles ads. Chris reunites with an old lady friend, who has become a stripper.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 7
|EpisodeNumber2= 7
|DirectedBy= P.D. Van Arsdol
|WrittenBy= Eric Estrin and Michael Berlin
|ShortSummary= A loathed publisher is found murdered.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 8
|EpisodeNumber2= 8
|DirectedBy= Brian Trenchard-Smith
|WrittenBy= Garner Simmons
|ShortSummary= A woman is found murdered in her pool.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 9
|EpisodeNumber2= 9
|DirectedBy= Ralph Hemecker
|WrittenBy= Elliott Anderson
|ShortSummary= A young girl is found dead by the side of the road. The evidence shows that the girl was gang-raped.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 10
|EpisodeNumber2= 10
|DirectedBy= Ralph Hemecker
|WrittenBy= Elliott Anderson
|ShortSummary= A mob lawyer and his hairdresser are shot in the barber shop.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 11
|EpisodeNumber2= 11
|DirectedBy= Kristine Peterson
|WrittenBy= Erica Byrne
|ShortSummary= A surgeon is killed with a scalpel.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 12
|EpisodeNumber2= 12
|DirectedBy= Stuart J.D. Perry
|WrittenBy= Simon Ayer
|ShortSummary= A baseball player becomes the main suspect, when a real estate tycoon is killed with a baseball bat.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 13
|EpisodeNumber2= 13
|DirectedBy= Ron Garcia
|WrittenBy= David Abramowitz
|ShortSummary= A woman is shot to death in her shower.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 14
|EpisodeNumber2= 14
|DirectedBy= Maria Lease
|WrittenBy= Todd Trotter
|ShortSummary= A man wants to see his wife in bed with another man, but becomes jealous and kills the man. While dumping the body, he's seen by a runaway. Chris becomes involved with a clothing designer.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 15
|EpisodeNumber2= 15
|DirectedBy= Perry Husman
|WrittenBy= Peter McCabe
|ShortSummary= A young nanny is found dead.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 16
|EpisodeNumber2= 16
|DirectedBy= Brian Trenchard-Smith
|WrittenBy= David Peckinpah
|ShortSummary= In exchange for immunity, a realtor helps Chris and Rita set up a sting operation against an illegal casino, who lets their clients build up big debts, and then kill them because they can't pay.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 17
|EpisodeNumber2= 17
|DirectedBy= Eric Alexander Forbes
|WrittenBy= Stephen J. Cannell
|ShortSummary= Chris and Rita goes to a potential murder scene, when they arrive at the scene they are fired upon. The man shot at them was patrol commander John Stonewell. Chris and Rita must now face a shooting review board.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 18
|EpisodeNumber2= 18
|DirectedBy= David Schmoeller
|WrittenBy= Garner Simmons
|ShortSummary= Chris responds to a burglary in progress, and kills one of the delinquents trying to get away. The boy's mother seeks revenge on Chris.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 19
|EpisodeNumber2= 19
|DirectedBy= Maria Lease
|WrittenBy= Todd Trotter
|ShortSummary= A call girl is killed, the only witness to the murder is another call girl.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
|EpisodeNumber= 20
|EpisodeNumber2= 20
|DirectedBy= Ralph Hemecker
|WrittenBy= David Peckinpah
|ShortSummary= In order to stop a drug kingpin, Hutch goes undercover as a drug dealer. Rita's old flame shows up and wants to rekindle their old romance.
|LineColor=2e3166
}}
}}
